long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Collection Saver â€“ The Ultimate Tool for Managing Your Browser Tabs.
Are you overwhelmed by the number of tabs open in your browser? Do you find it challenging to keep track of your research, work, or personal browsing sessions? Look no further! Tab Collection Saver is a powerful Chrome extension designed to make your browsing experience more organized and efficient.

Key Features:
Save Tab Collections: With just one click, you can save all your open tabs as a named collection. This feature allows you to quickly group and save your tabs for easy retrieval later.

Restore Collections: Need to revisit your saved tabs? Easily restore any of your previously saved collections with a few simple clicks. Perfect for quickly accessing your research or resuming where you left off.

Export/Import: Securely back up your tab collections by exporting them, or transfer them to another device by importing. This feature ensures that your valuable browsing sessions are always within reach, no matter where you are.

Privacy Focused: Your privacy is our priority. Tab Collection Saver keeps all your data local to your device, so your browsing habits and information remain private and secure.

Tab Collection Saver is the ideal tool for anyone who wants to streamline their browsing experience and keep their tab collections organized. Download it now and take control of your tabs like never before!
